{"id":571890381,"lang":"java","time":"3 months, 4 weeks","timestamp":1634350332,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/571890381/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Monotonic Array","memory":"48.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public boolean isMonotonic(int[] A) {\n        return increasing(A) || decreasing(A);\n    }\n\n    public boolean increasing(int[] A) {\n        for (int i = 0; i < A.length - 1; ++i)\n            if (A[i] > A[i+1]) return false;\n        return true;\n    }\n\n    public boolean decreasing(int[] A) {\n        for (int i = 0; i < A.length - 1; ++i)\n            if (A[i] < A[i+1]) return false;\n        return true;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"monotonic-array"}
